title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sen. Tom Cotton & Gavin McInnes | 6/24/20
description:
Glenn has a prediction about Mount Rushmore now that protesters have gone after statues of all four men. Sen. Tom Cotton is backing President Trump’s order to charge monument vandals and joins to explain why. Censored.TV founder Gavin McInnes was banned from YouTube for a comment he made on Parler, saying he’d take back the CHAZ on his birthday.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
